mapper.sql: BUSINESS_ID, USER_ID, USERNAME, BUSINESS_BEGIN_DATE, BUSINESS_END_DATE, BEGIN_DATE_TYPE, END_DATE_TYPE, BUSINESS_PLACE, REMARK, AUTH_STATUS, APPLY_TIME, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from oa_business
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into oa_business (BUSINESS_ID, USER_ID, USERNAME, BUSINESS_BEGIN_DATE, BUSINESS_END_DATE, BEGIN_DATE_TYPE, END_DATE_TYPE, BUSINESS_PLACE, REMARK, AUTH_STATUS, APPLY_TIME, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME) values (#{businessId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessBeginDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{businessEndDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{beginDateType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{endDateType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{businessPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{applyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

update oa_business
BUSINESS_ID = #{record.businessId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
USER_ID = #{record.userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
USERNAME = #{record.username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUSINESS_BEGIN_DATE = #{record.businessBeginDate,jdbcType=DATE},

update oa_business set BUSINESS_ID = #{record.businessId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, USER_ID = #{record.userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, USERNAME = #{record.username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUSINESS_BEGIN_DATE = #{record.businessBeginDate,jdbcType=DATE}, BUSINESS_END_DATE = #{record.businessEndDate,jdbcType=DATE}, BEGIN_DATE_TYPE = #{record.beginDateType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, END_DATE_TYPE = #{record.endDateType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BUSINESS_PLACE = #{record.businessPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUTH_STATUS = #{record.authStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, APPLY_TIME = #{record.applyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

update oa_business
USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
USERNAME = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

BUSINESS_END_DATE = #{businessEndDate,jdbcType=DATE},

where BUSINESS_ID = #{businessId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
